reporter_caption.center: MATTER OF CITY OF NEW YORK, 220 N.Y. 665 (1917)

caption.center: In the Matter of the Application of the CITY OF NEW YORK, Respondent,
Relative to Acquiring Title to Lands Required for the Opening and
Extending of East Twelfth Street, from Ditmas Avenue to Foster Avenue, in

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
Herbert G. Andrews for appellant.
Lamar Hardy, Corporation Counsel (Andrew C. Troy and EdwinJ. Talley of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed, with costs; no opinion.
Concur: HISCOCK, Ch. J., CHASE, CUDDEBACK, HOGAN, POUND, McLAUGHLIN and ANDREWS, JJ.
